channel.title: How to change xp rate on project insanity source?
channel.description: How do i change the xp rates for all stats?

item.title: How to change xp rate on project insanity source?
item.dc:creator: @NathanielBacon NathanielBacon
item.description:
@NathanielBacon wrote:

To chance the exp rate for non-combat skills follow this path. Project Insanity>src>server>model>players… then click on the file of the skills you want to edit (the exp rate is within that file).

Once you go into a certain file (lets use fishing for example) it will say that shrimps give you 10 exp, but yet in-game it give you 400. That is because of the exp multiplier. That can be found in the scr>server>config file. It is by default set to 40. The easiest way to change the exp rate is to change the multiplier from 40 to 1, then go back into the fishing file and change the exp from there. This just makes things simpler. Although if you want to have something like a “double xp day” then the multiplier makes it easy to do so.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change xp rate on project insanity source?

item.title: How to change xp rate on project insanity source?

@b00bies wrote:
